name: Sisters Footy 7v7 Tournament Team Booking - Bangalore 29th SEP
description:
Ladiessss! 
The Woman's Sisters Footy Tournament is back and we couldn't be more excited about it!! 
An recreational tournament open to all members of our community! 
Tournament Details: 
Day and Date - 29th September, Sunday 
Venue - Rush Arena  
Reporting time - 8:30 AM  
This is an team Sign up. 
Match details: 
Format : 10 min Halves + 2 minutes break 
Each team : 7 + 2 Sub 
League cum Knockout 
Read further for the FAQs of the tournament : 
Q1. What time will it end? 
1:00pm is the Finals, followed by the Prize Distribution. 
Q2. What are the rules of the game? • 
7v7 • Rolling substitutions, with no limit to number of substitutions in a match • 10 minutes per half •  
More details on the rules of the game will be shared soon. 
Q3. Will we get breaks in-between the matches? 
Yes. You will be given a short break between matches to catch your breath and a snack. 
Q4. Will refreshments/food be provided? 
Water will be available for all players. Request everyone to carry their own bottle of water to refill. However, feel free to carry a snack and beverage from home if you like. 
There will be goodies at the venue as well 
Q5. Who is eligible to participate? 
Any girl/woman who is a member of our community 
Q6. What if I haven’t ever played Football before? 
The level of this tournament is beginner to intermediate. We would recommend some very basic prior experience, at our SIS footy sessions, or elsewhere, at the very least. 
Q7. Do I register as an individual player? 
Yes. You need to  registration is on a different link on our website  
Q8. Do I need any special equipment/attire? 
We recommend the usual football attire for a safer and better playing experience i.e. jersey/sports top, shorts, football shoes 
Q9. Will there be a changing room and wash room there? 
Yes. 
Q10. Can I bring my family and friends to watch? 
Absolutely! We encourage it! :) 
Q11. How will the teams receive any further communication, such as team colour, match schedule etc? 
Once the teams are formed, Captains from each team will be our main point of contact for any further communication to the teams. The Captains will be responsible for creating their team’s whatsapp group and relaying all necessary information to their teams. 
Hope that answers most of your questions ladies. For any further information, please feel free to reach out :) 
We can't wait for you to experience this, ladies!! Let's kick this year off on a high! 
For support contact : Aishwarya Bharathi ( 9738012622)

location.name: RUSH Arena Jaibharath Nagar
location.address: D Costa Layout,  Maruthi Sevanagar,  Bengaluru,  Karnataka 560084

name: Upper-body Calisthenics Workshop
description:
Join us for a 90-minute empowering workshop designed exclusively for women to master the fundamentals of upper body calisthenics. Whether you're a beginner or looking to refine your skills, this session will focus on building strength, improving form, and gaining confidence in your bodyweight training. Together, we'll cover essential exercises like push-ups, dips, and pull-ups, breaking them down step-by-step to ensure you leave with a solid foundation. Come ready to challenge yourself, learn new techniques, and connect with like-minded women on the same journey toward a stronger, fitter you!  
Post the session, you can enjoy some refreshing kombucha from Atmosphere Studio on the house! 
Date: 1st Septembr 2024, Sunday 
Reporting Time: 9.45 am 
Venue: CaliOG, Koramangla 
Call or WhatsApp Saachi (9513334690) for any queries 
*please carry a water bottle to keep you hydrated

location.name: CaliOG
location.address: 84,  1st C Main Rd,  Jakkasandra,  1st Block Koramangala,  Koramangala,  Bengaluru,  Karnataka 560034

name: Pickleball Pop-up with Swysh
description:
LADIES! 
We have something new planned for you! 
Come try a new and easy to learn sport with us! 
Pickleball is one of the fastest growing sports in the world and we are here to help you learn! 
Session requirements : Comfortable workout clothes, shoes (running shoes/training shoes), water bottle and lots of enthusiasm! 
The session is 2 hours long, and will consist of a warm-up, sport based drills which are fun and athletic, a small game and a cool down at the end. 
It is a super fun sport that is easy to pick up and even helps you get in your cardio for the day! 
Please note- the reporting time is 9.45 am 
So sign up and join us!! 
Contact Saachi for any questions 
9513334690

name: B'ball with the sisters and misters
url: https://sistersinsweat.in/session_details/basketball/Bball Gameday with the Sisters and Misters
description:
BBALL WITH THE SISTERS and MISTERS  - SUNDAY GAME DAY 
Hey Ladies! 
We are introducing Basketball game nights to our session offerings. These game nights are of complete game time with 4 Quarters. It will be a 5v5 full Court game with substitutes and a mixed-format game, which means there will be men joining in for these as well. The reason we are doing this is to give you amazing women more match-based experience in basketball and to have high-intensity games, definitely improves that! 
Please note that you must have prior experience with the basics of Basketball. These game nights are not for beginners. 
Please note that this is only for women to book, the men's bookings will be taken through a closed WhatsApp group. 
Join us, ladies! It's going to be a blast! 
Contact:  
Aishwarya Bharathi 
9738012622

name: B'Ball with the Sisters - Beginners and Intermediate
description:
Hey Ladies! Get ready to play some BBall with us! 
 
Location : St. Joseph's Arts And Science College Time : 7:30-9:00pm Day : Wednesdays 
 
These sessions are open to all women at the Beginner level of the sport! The basketball drills will be designed to both push you and at the same time, build on your basics! Each session is 90mins long, and will consist of a warm-up, basketball drills which are fun and athletic, a small game and a cool down at the end. It is a super fun activity to add to your day and apart from that, even helps you get in your cardio for the day! 
What to wear? Comfortable workout clothes, incase you don't have access to basketball shoes, training shoes would be sufficient. 
 
What to bring? A bottle of water, a towel to wipe off sweat (if required) and loads of enthusiasm to play! Sign up and join us ladies!! 
 
Contact: 
Vibha 
8073681373

name: BBall with the Sisters - Intermediate
description:
BBALL WITH THE SISTERS - FRIDAY - INTERMEDIATE SESSIONS: 
Bring out those kicks and get your bounce on, we're getting out on the court to play some BALL !! 
These sessions are open to all women at the intermediate level! The basketball drills will be designed to both push you and at the same time, build on your existing basics! A bit of prior playing experience is required, not recommended for beginners. Each session is 90mins long, and will consist of a warm-up, basketball drills which are fun and athletic, a small game and a cool down at the end. It is a super fun start to your day and apart from that, even helps you get in your cardio for the day! 
What to wear? Comfortable workout clothes, incase you don't have access to basketball shoes, training shoes would be sufficient. 
What to bring? A bottle of water, a towel to wipe off sweat (if required) and loads of enthusiasm to play :) See you on the field Sisters!!

These sessions are open to all women. The Football drills are designed to be fun while you learn the basics of the sport. 
Each session is 90 minutes long and consists of a warm-up, one fun and athletic Football drill, and game time! Get your cardio for the day in the most ‘Football ’ way possible!
